metadata.title: CVE-2023-44487 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - high
metadata.description: The HTTP/2 protocol allows a denial of service (server resourceconsumption) because request cancellation can reset many streams quickly,as exploited in the wild in August through October 2023.

criterions.comment: haproxy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
